All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    Application  
    ContextAlreadyExistsException
    Exception to be thrown when a context was tried to be created that already existed.
    ContextAlreadyExistsExceptionHandling
    Handle exceptions to be thrown when a context was tried to be created that already existed.
    ContextApiController
    Rest controller for handling all context requests.
    ContextListVO  
    ContextMap
    Hashmap to be used as an in memory context cache.
    ContextRepository
    Repository for storing and retrieving contexts.
    ContextServerApi  
    ContextValidationException
    Exception to be thrown if a context was received that is invalid.
    ContextValidationExceptionHandler
    Handle exceptions to be thrown if a context was received that is invalid.
    CouldNotCreateContextException
    Exception to be thrown in case a context could not have been created.
    CouldNotCreateContextExceptionHandler
    Handle exceptions to be thrown in case a context could not have been created.
    CouldNotCreateContextURLException
    Exception to be thrown in case a url for the context could not have been created.
    CouldNotCreateContextURLExceptionHandler
    Handle exceptions to be thrown in case a url for the context could not have been created.
    CouldNotDeleteException
    Exception to be thrown in case a context could not have been deleted.
    CouldNotDeleteExceptionHandler
    Handle exceptions to be thrown in case a context could not have been deleted.
    ErrorType
    Error types as defined by the NGSI-LD spec.
    FileNotReadableException
    Exception to be thrown in case a context-file is not readable.
    FileNotReadableExceptionHandler
    Handle exceptions to be thrown in case a context-file is not readable.
    FolderNotReadableException
    Exception to be thrown in case the context folder is not readable.
    FolderNotReadableExceptionHandler
    Handle exceptions to be thrown in case the context folder is not readable.
    FTPContextRepository
    Repository implementation using an ftp-server as a backend.
    FTPProperties
    Configurations for running the server with an FTP-Server as storage backend.
    FTPServerNotAvailableException
    Exception to be thrown in case the ftp is not available.
    FTPServerNotAvailableExceptionHandler
    Handle exceptions to be thrown in case the ftp is not available.
    GCSAccessException
    Exception to be thrown in case the gcs-bucket could not have been accessed.
    GCSAccessExceptionHandler
    Handle exceptions to be thrown in case the gcs-bucket could not have been accessed.
    GCSContextRepository
    Repository implementation using an gcs-server as a backend.
    GCSProperties
    Configurations for running the server with a GCS-Bucket as storage backend.
    GCSStorageFactory
    Factory to create the gcs-storage bean
    GeneralExceptionHandler
    Handler to catch all not specifically(unexpected) handled exceptions and map them NGSI-LD compliant.
    GeneralProperties
    General properties to be used for the server.
    InMemoryContextRepository
    Repository implementation using an in-memory store as a backend.
    LocalDiscContextRepository
    Repository implementation using the local disc as a backend.
    LocalDiscPersistence
    Filesystem wrapper bean to allow replacement in unit tests.
    LocalDiscProperties
    Use the local file system as storage backend
    MethodNotAllowedFilter
    Filter out all 405 responses an map them to 422 as defined by the NGSI-LD api.
    NGSICompliantExceptionHandler<T extends Throwable>
    Base exception handler to produce NGSI-LD compliant http responses.
    NoSuchContextException
    Exception to be thrown in case the requested context does not exist.
    NoSuchContextExceptionHandler
    Handle exceptions to be thrown in case the requested context does not exist.
    ProblemDetails
    Problem details as defined by RFC-7807" and mandated by the NGSI-LD Spec 5.5.2 and 5.5.3
    ProblemDetailsVO  
    RepositoryCreationException
    Exception to be thrown in case a repository could not have been created.
    TimeTypeConverterRegistrar
